sql.if:
and (t8.arId like binary CONCAT('%', #{keyWorlds ,jdbcType=CHAR},'%') or t8.processInstId like binary CONCAT('%', #{keyWorlds ,jdbcType=CHAR},'%') or t8.ordrId like binary CONCAT('%', #{keyWorlds ,jdbcType=CHAR},'%')
)

mapper.select:
SELECT t3.Fnc_Entp AS fncEntp, t3.Ustrm_Splr AS ustrmSplr, t3.StgCo AS stgco, t3.Bnk AS bnk, t3.Lgstc_Co AS lgstcCo, t3.Ins_Co AS insCo, t3.SplChain_Co AS splchainCo, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 1) AS aplyPcstpCdName, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 2) AS aplyPcstpCd, t3.BTp as btp, t3.SvcFee_CMd as svcfeeCmd, t3.id AS id, t3.Ar_ID AS arId, t3.Ordr_ID AS ordrId, t3.PROCESS_INST_ID AS processInstId,
t3.SPG_ID AS spgId, t3.Spg_Tm AS spgTm, t3.Spg_Psn AS spgPsn, t3.Spg_Psn_Ctc_Tel AS spgPsnCtcTel, t3.Cnsgn AS cnsgn, t3.Cnsgn_Ctc_Tel AS cnsgnCtcTel, t3.Pps_Lnd AS ppsLnd, t3.Tms AS tms, t3.Spg_St AS spgStï¼Œ t3.Crt_Tm AS crtTm FROM ( SELECT distinct t13.*, t1.Fnc_Entp,t1.Ustrm_Splr,t1.StgCo,t1.Bnk,t1.Lgstc_Co,t1.Ins_Co,t1.SplChain_Co,t1.BTp,t1.SvcFee_CMd FROM T6_Spg_Inf t13, T1_AR_Inf t1 where t13.spg_id=#{spgId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t13.Ar_Id = t1.Ar_Id ) t3 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.PROC_INST_ID_, t2.GROUP_ID_, t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ FROM act_ru_task t1, act_ru_identitylink t2 WHERE t1.ID_ = t2.TASK_ID_ ) t4 ON t3.PROCESS_INST_ID = t4.PROC_INST_ID_

SELECT t3.Fnc_Entp AS fncEntp, t3.Ustrm_Splr AS ustrmSplr, t3.StgCo AS stgco, t3.Bnk AS bnk, t3.Lgstc_Co AS lgstcCo, t3.Ins_Co AS insCo, t3.SplChain_Co AS splchainCo, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 1) AS aplyPcstpCdName, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 2) AS aplyPcstpCd, t3.BTp as btp, t3.SvcFee_CMd as svcfeeCmd, t3.id AS id, t3.Ar_ID AS arId, t3.Ordr_ID AS ordrId, t3.PROCESS_INST_ID AS processInstId,
t3.SPG_ID AS spgId, t3.Spg_Tm AS spgTm, t3.Spg_Psn AS spgPsn, t3.Spg_Psn_Ctc_Tel AS spgPsnCtcTel, t3.Cnsgn AS cnsgn, t3.Cnsgn_Ctc_Tel AS cnsgnCtcTel, t3.Pps_Lnd AS ppsLnd, t3.Tms AS tms, t3.Spg_St AS spgSt FROM ( SELECT distinct t13.*, t1.Fnc_Entp,t1.Ustrm_Splr,t1.StgCo,t1.Bnk,t1.Lgstc_Co,t1.Ins_Co,t1.SplChain_Co,t1.BTp,t1.SvcFee_CMd FROM T6_Spg_Inf t13, T1_AR_Inf t1 where t13.Spg_ID=#{spgId,jdbcType=CHAR} and t13.Ar_Id = t1.Ar_Id ) t3 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.PROC_INST_ID_, t2.GROUP_ID_, t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ FROM act_ru_task t1, act_ru_identitylink t2 WHERE t1.ID_ = t2.TASK_ID_ ) t4 ON t3.PROCESS_INST_ID = t4.PROC_INST_ID_
